    • Method Detail

      • createAccount

        boolean createAccount(java.util.UUID id,
                      long balance)
               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Create an Account with balance

        REST: /create?id=${id}&balance=${balance}

        Parameters:
        id - create account with this id
        balance - create account with balance
        Returns:
        true in case of success or false otherwise (account already exists)
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getHistory

        Get all transactions for account accountId

        REST: /history?id=${id}

        Parameters:
        id - accounts' id
        Returns:
        sorted list of transactions Transaction
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • transfer

        TransferResult transfer(java.util.UUID src,
                        java.util.UUID dst,
                        long amount)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Transfer money from src to dst

        REST: /transfer?src=${src}&dst=${dst}&amount=${amount}

        Parameters:
        src - source account Id
        dst - destination account Id
        amount - - must be > 0
        Returns:
        TransferResult
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • checkTransactionHash

        boolean checkTransactionHash(java.util.UUID id)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Check integrity of transaction with id ${id} and all it's parent transactions

        REST: /checkTransactionHash?id=${id}

        Parameters:
        id - accounts' id
        Returns:
        true in case of success or false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
